DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVE : To evaluate efficacy prevention contrast induce nephropathy patient ST segment elevation myocardial infarction treat primary percutaneous coronary intervention . DESIGN : Prospective study . SETTING : Three-center study Acute kidney injury define rise creatinine > 25 % baseline Serum creatinine measure baseline day follow 3 day 30 day . Patients randomise : 1 . Standard treatment 2 . Standard treatment + acetylcystein 2 day 3 . Standard treatment + Sodium bicarbonate 500 ml / follow 100 ml/h 5 hour 4 . Standard treatment + acetylcystein 2 day + Sodium bicarbonate 500 ml / follow 100 ml/h 5 hour
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Contrast-induced Nephropathy Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: STEMI patient treat primary PCI Cardiogenic shock
